Ian Wellard

4 May 2020

Tom was a great asset in partnering very strongly with me and my teams with a highly complex and demanding program of work. His ability to source, screen and recommend quality after quality candidates was invaluable!! Thoroughly recommend Tom to all candidates and clients!
